titleNullable: Russian Losses in Russia Ukraine War
subtitleNullable: All Russian Losses Reported by Ministry Defence of Ukraine 🐱‍👤
descriptionNullable:
Data is gathered by me. Data is publicly available from the [Ministry of Defense of Ukraine](https://www.mil.gov.ua/en/) (News tab).

Notebook: https://www.kaggle.com/dimitryzub/russo-loses-analysis


- `date` column is sorted from 2022-02-24 to 2022-10-05.
- `None` values were filled with `0` as `None` values are [Missing At Random (MAR)](https://www.analyticsvidhya.com/blog/2021/10/handling-missing-value/).
- Some of the columns need to be standardized e.g `float64` -> `int`. 

For some reason even after type casting, `pandas` saves some of the columns as `float64`. If it happens, here's a code snippet to convert the data type:

```
astype({
    'cannons': 'int',
    'mlrs_buk': 'int',
    'mlrs_grad': 'int',
    'mlrs': 'int',
    'anti_air': 'int',
    'uav': 'int',
    'cruise_missiles': 'int',
    'ships': 'int',
    'cars_cisterns': 'int',
    'special_equpment': 'int',
})
```
title: Russian Losses in Russia Ukraine War
subtitle: All Russian Losses Reported by Ministry Defence of Ukraine 🐱‍👤
description:
Data is gathered by me. Data is publicly available from the [Ministry of Defense of Ukraine](https://www.mil.gov.ua/en/) (News tab).

Notebook: https://www.kaggle.com/dimitryzub/russo-loses-analysis


- `date` column is sorted from 2022-02-24 to 2022-10-05.
- `None` values were filled with `0` as `None` values are [Missing At Random (MAR)](https://www.analyticsvidhya.com/blog/2021/10/handling-missing-value/).
- Some of the columns need to be standardized e.g `float64` -> `int`. 

For some reason even after type casting, `pandas` saves some of the columns as `float64`. If it happens, here's a code snippet to convert the data type:

```
astype({
    'cannons': 'int',
    'mlrs_buk': 'int',
    'mlrs_grad': 'int',
    'mlrs': 'int',
    'anti_air': 'int',
    'uav': 'int',
    'cruise_missiles': 'int',
    'ships': 'int',
    'cars_cisterns': 'int',
    'special_equpment': 'int',
})
```
